text: Brachystephanus is a genus of plants in the family Acanthaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Brachystephanus giganteus Champl. * Brachystephanus kupeensis Champl. * Brachystephanus longiflorus Lindau * Brachystephanus nimbae Heine Category:Acanthaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Brachystephanus
